info.title: Patchman-engine API
info.description:
API of the Patch application on [console.redhat.com](https://console.redhat.com)

Syntax of the `filter[name]` query parameters is described in  [Filters documentation](https://github.com/RedHatInsights/patchman-engine/wiki/API-custom-filters)

get.summary: Show me all applicable advisories for all my systems
get.description: Show me all applicable advisories for all my systems

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit for paging, set -1 to return all

parameters.name: filter[system_profile][sap_sids][in]
parameters.description: Filter systems by their SAP SIDs

get.summary: Show me details an advisory by given advisory name
get.description: Show me details an advisory by given advisory name

get.summary: Show me systems on which the given advisory is applicable
get.description: Show me systems on which the given advisory is applicable

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit for paging, set -1 to return all

parameters.name: filter[system_profile][sap_sids][in]
parameters.description: Filter systems by their SAP SIDs

get.description: Show me all baselines for all my systems

advisory_type.description: Deprecated, not useful database ID (0 - unknown, 1 -, enhancement, 2 - bugfix, 3 - security, 4 - unspecified)

advisory_type_name.description: Advisory type name, proper ordering ensured (unknown, unspecified, other, enhancement, bugfix, security)

advisory_type.description: Deprecated, not useful database ID (0 - unknown, 1 -, enhancement, 2 - bugfix, 3 - security, 4 - unspecified)

advisory_type_name.description: Advisory type name, proper ordering ensured (unknown, unspecified, other, enhancement, bugfix, security)

to_time.description: Filter applicable advisories (updates) by the latest publish time.

systems.description: Count of the systems associated with the baseline

inventory_ids.description: List of inventory IDs to have baselines removed
Inventory IDs list of systems to associate with this baseline (optional).

baseline_id.description: Updated baseline unique ID, it can not be changed
Updated baseline unique ID, it can not be changed

subtotals.description: Some subtotals used by some endpoints

inventory_ids.description: Map of inventories to add to (true) or remove (false) from given baseline (optional)

baseline_id.description: Updated baseline unique ID, it can not be changed
